analysis.description:
Smart234.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#298-313) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- admin.transfer(_payout / 25) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#307-309)
	- msg.sender.transfer(_payout * 24 / 25) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#309-310)
Smart234.bytesToAddress (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#223-227) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in Smart234.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#298-313):
	External calls:
	- _payout = x.dividends(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#299-300)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- x (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#305)
_payout in InvestorsStorage.dividends (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#178) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in Smart234.invest (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#276-298):
	External calls:
	- x.r(msg.sender) != 0x0 (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#283-292)
	- refSystem() (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#283-286)
	- bonus = addReferrer() (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#288-290)
	- refSystem() (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#290-292)
	- x.addDeposit(msg.sender,msg.value + bonus) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#292-293)
	External calls sending eth:
	- admin.transfer(msg.value / 25) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#282)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- invested (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#294-295)

Reentrancy in Smart234.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#298-313):
	External calls:
	- _payout = x.dividends(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#299-300)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- invested (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#305)
	- payed (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#305)
	- waveStartUp (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#305)

Reentrancy in Smart234.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#298-313):
	External calls:
	- _payout = x.dividends(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#299-300)
	- x.updateCheckpoint(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#306)
	External calls sending eth:
	- admin.transfer(_payout / 25) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#307-309)
	- msg.sender.transfer(_payout * 24 / 25) (/unique_chucks/44/0x8631a2be9aa877a1cc711e66b68991b1e6922b78.sol#309-310)
	State variables written after the call(s):
